snippet: If art buyers were feeling a bit of auction fatigue going into Sotheby’s contemporary art evening sale — the sixth auction in seven days — they did not show it in their bidding for several major works.
abstract: Sotheby's contemporary art auction brings in $294.85 million on sales of 53 works, indication that fears that art buyers were feeling fatigued by string of consecutive auctions were overblown.

byline.original: By ROBIN POGREBIN and SCOTT REYBURN

lead_paragraph: If art buyers were feeling a bit of auction fatigue going into Sotheby’s contemporary art evening sale — the sixth auction in seven days — they did not show it in their bidding for several major works.

headline.main: Sale Offers a Reason for Relief at Sotheby’s
headline.print_headline: Contemporary Sale Gives Sotheby’s Reason for Relief
